issues.title: Missing meta descriptions
issues.description: Pages are missing meta description tags, which are important for search engine snippets and AI citation readiness.
issues.recommendation: Add unique meta description tags (150-160 characters) to all pages, including relevant keywords and a clear call-to-action.

issues.title: Missing H1 headings
issues.description: Pages lack H1 headings, which help search engines understand the main topic of the page.
issues.recommendation: Add a single H1 heading to each page that clearly describes the page's main topic.

issues.title: Missing page title
issues.description: One or more pages are missing required title tags, which are critical for SEO and user experience.
issues.recommendation: Add descriptive title tags (50-60 characters) to all pages.

issues.title: Thin content detected
issues.description: Some pages have very low word counts, which may negatively impact search rankings and AI citation quality.
issues.recommendation: Expand content on thin pages to at least 300-500 words. Add valuable, substantive information that addresses user needs.

issues.title: Missing robots.txt
issues.description: No robots.txt file found. This file helps search engines understand which pages to crawl and which to exclude.
issues.recommendation: Create a robots.txt file at the domain root to guide search engine crawlers.

issues.title: Missing sitemap.xml
issues.description: No XML sitemap found. Sitemaps help search engines discover all pages on the site, especially important for larger sites.
issues.recommendation: Create and submit an XML sitemap to Google Search Console and Bing Webmaster Tools.

issues.title: Non-HTML resources crawled
issues.description: The crawler encountered non-HTML resources (CSS, images) during the crawl.
issues.recommendation: Consider excluding non-HTML resources from future crawls using robots.txt or crawl configuration.

issues.title: No Schema.org structured data
issues.description: No Schema.org structured data (JSON-LD, Microdata, or RDFa) was found on the site. AI systems strongly prefer sites with structured data for citation.
issues.recommendation: Implement JSON-LD structured data using Schema.org vocabulary. Start with Organization, Article, or FAQ schemas as appropriate.

issues.title: Missing FAQ schema
issues.description: No FAQ schema found. FAQ content with structured data is highly valued for AI citations and featured snippets.
issues.recommendation: Create FAQ pages with proper FAQPage schema markup to improve AI citation opportunities.

issues.title: Missing HowTo schema
issues.description: No HowTo schema found. How-to content with structured data is frequently cited by AI systems.
issues.recommendation: Add HowTo schema to any how-to content on the site.

issues.title: Missing OpenGraph tags
issues.description: No OpenGraph meta tags found. OpenGraph helps control how URLs appear when shared on social media.
issues.recommendation: Add OpenGraph meta tags (og:title, og:description, og:image, og:url) for better social sharing.

issues.title: Missing Twitter Card tags
issues.description: No Twitter Card meta tags found. Twitter Cards enhance how URLs appear in tweets.
issues.recommendation: Add Twitter Card meta tags (twitter:card, twitter:title, twitter:description, twitter:image).

issues.title: Missing author information
issues.description: No author information or Author schema found. E-E-A-T (Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, Trustworthiness) requires clear attribution.
issues.recommendation: Add author bio pages and implement Author schema markup. Link author names to their profiles throughout the site.

issues.title: Missing Organization schema
issues.description: No Organization schema found. Adding this helps establish brand authority and improves knowledge graph visibility.
issues.recommendation: Add Organization schema with company name, logo, contact info, and social profiles.

issues.title: Missing About page
issues.description: No About page detected. About pages are important for establishing trust and authority.
issues.recommendation: Create a comprehensive About page describing the organization, team, and mission.

issues.title: Missing Privacy Policy
issues.description: No Privacy Policy page detected. This is important for trust and may be required for compliance.
issues.recommendation: Add a Privacy Policy page, especially if collecting user data.

issues.title: Limited internal linking
issues.description: The site has limited internal links between pages, which affects crawlability and page authority distribution.
issues.recommendation: Improve internal linking structure. Add navigation menus, related content links, and breadcrumb navigation.
